ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
pangolier_shield_crash.desc:
Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground, damaging all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.

Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.

ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
pangolier_gyroshell.desc:
Pangolier curls into a magic-immune ball and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
pangolier_gyroshell.notes: Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.

STUN DURATION: 1 / 1.25 / 1.5
KNOCKBACK DISTANCE: 150
pangolier_gyroshell.cmb:
100
70
pangolier_gyroshell.lore: Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...

dark_willow_shadow_realm.desc: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
grimstroke_ink_creature.desc:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
grimstroke_ink_creature.notes:
The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or magic immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.

32/28/24/20
grimstroke_ink_creature.lore: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.

AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes

grimstroke_soul_chain.desc: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.

Provides vision of both leashed units.
